tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sustainable_packaging_materials (
  material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  supplier_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  country_of_origin TEXT,
  sustainability_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE sustainable_materials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(255),
    source_location VARCHAR(255),
    sustainability_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE material_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_person VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255),
    material_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES sustainable_materials(id)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE sourcing_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    amount_purchased INT,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id UUID,
  material_id UUID,
  quantity INT,
  order_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_inventory (
  inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  source_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (source_id) REFERENCES packaging_sources(source_id)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  order_date DATE NOT NULL,
  delivery_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id)
);
